All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Armor
Represents body armor that can be worn by the player.
Bullet
Represents a projectile fired from a weapon.
ByteStrike
Main class.
Communication
Facilitates communication over the network with strings and maps.
GameView
 
Grenade
Represents a hand grenade.
HealthKit
Represents a health kit.
Item
A flag that identifies a class as a type of Item.
Level
Handles the tile arrangement of the world in which entities interact.
Level.Tile
Represents a tile on the level.
LevelBuilder
Generates the bare outline of a level from the luminance values in an image.
MainView
Displays the main menu of the game.
Moveable
A representation of an entity-like object that can be moved.
Pistol
Represents a pistol.
Player
Represents a player.
Ray
Represents an invisible object used to implement basic ray casting.
Rifle
Represents a classic rifle in any shooter game.
Screen
Manages the graphical user interface for the game.
Server
 
Settings
Contains various game-wide settings.
Shop
 
Shotgun
Represents a shotgun.
SMG
Represents a sub-machine gun.
Sniper
Represents a sniper.
SoundManager
Manages the audio capabilities of the game.
SpriteLoader
Handles the loading and drawing of sprite images.
Weapon
Represents an abstract projectile weapon that can be used by the player.
